title: Is the free RP at level 5 removed?
body: Made a new account to play with some friends in Sweden (I'm in Ireland) and I was hoping to get a champion when they were on sale with the free rp but now I am level 11 and I still have not been rewarded with free rp if anybody knows anything about it please comment! Thanks! :D {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Indeed, free RP for new accounts were changed quite a bit ago.  It's been replaced with the[ new player chest](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) to introduce new players to hextech crafting as well as hooking them up with some free stuff.  Hope that helps clear things up!

The 400 RP stipend was replaced with a Hextech Box and Key at level 5. I took a look at your account and it seems you've already opened the chest. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
